ComicInfo.Title: Inherit the Earth Part Four: One Man's Army; Tales of ZvR: After the Hands Appeared It All Went To Shit!; The Orphan
ComicInfo.Summary:
Astronauts on a dead Earth crawling with strange threats like oddly sentient zombies, robots and… Mermen! And more with The Orphan!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Ashley Wood | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | James Stokoe | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-06 18:30:05. [CVDB486771]
ComicInfo.Writer: Ashley Wood, Chris Ryall, Steve Niles
ComicInfo.Penciller: Anthony Diecidue, Ashley Wood, Val Mayerik
ComicInfo.Inker: Anthony Diecidue, Ashley Wood, Val Mayerik
ComicInfo.Characters: Ann Tran, Cesar Ortiz, Finola Moorpark, Jenae Jefferson, Jukka Elfson, Rosemary, Zeb Nova
